title: 工业在服务端怎么更改核电的爆炸半径
author: Q撒啥玩
txt_content:
如题，工业怎么修改核电的爆炸范围，在服务端的配置上修改哪个？
我想把它改成1，摧毁核电本体就行

replies.author: 千翔
replies.txt_content:
config\IC2.ini

; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 60或者45
; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 60或者45
这两个改为
; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 0
; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 1
是在不会，
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-336350-1-18.html

replies.author: mc1549570730
replies.txt_content: 配置文件里 哪些英文翻译一下 找到那一项就好了

replies.author: Q撒啥玩
replies.txt_content:
mc1549570730 发表于 2016-1-23 10:30
配置文件里 哪些英文翻译一下 找到那一项就好了
机翻很蛋疼 都不准的
求配置文件具体位置

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
config\IC2.ini

; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit =  默认值是多少来着= =
